passwordgenerator

Class Password

  • java.lang.Object
    • passwordgenerator.Password

  • public class Password
extends java.lang.Object
    A object instance of this class "Password" has: - a Password (as String) - a MD5 Hash (as String) - (as char array) the choice of the containing characters for a generated plain text password
    Version:
    2012-04-19
    Author:
    Kevin Weis

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Password(char[] choice, int length)
      Constructor 2: A password will be generated from a known length and a choice (Checkboxes) of the containing characters than a MD5 of it.
      Password(java.lang.String password)
      Constructor 1: Set a known password and a MD5 of it will be generated.
